column5: This is a red brick gray tile independent villa, it is a two-story building, construction area of 3242 square feet, land area of 7780 Lot Sqft, built in 2000, in December 2016 in the new renovation. The first floor is the master bedroom and public event space. On the second floor there are 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 washbasins, an entertainment hall and a lot of storage rooms, the apartment design is very easy to use, especially comfortable.
